item.title: Java CopyOnWriteArrayList
item.description: package com.yanxizhu; import java.util.*; /** * @description: synchronizedList遍历错误 * @date: 2022/3/19 11:30 * @version: 1.0 */ public class ConCurrentHashMapTest { public static void main(String[] args) { conCurrentDemo conCurrentDemo = new conCurrentDemo(); for(int i=0;i<5;i++){ new Thread(conCurrentDemo).start(); } } public static class conCurrentDemo implements Runnable{ //并发线程安全，修改报错 private static List<String> list = Collections.synchronizedList(new ArrayList<>()); static { list.add("apple"); list.add("xiaomi"); list.add("huawei"); } @Override public void run() { Iterator<String> iterator = list.iterator(); while(iterator.hasNext()){ System.out.println(iterator.next()); list.add("iphone"); } } } } 线程安全报错：
